title: Why is Twitch named "Kitty" in in-game chat?!
body: Why is Twitch  {{champion:29}}  named "Kitty" in in-game chat when he was killed? Is that normal? Cuz that's the first time that i saw that.

replies.body: Gnar has also two different chat-names. Gnar,if he is in normal-form, and Mega-Gnar, if he has transformed

Anivia im Ei heißt auch Eggnivia.
Ich glaub da gibt es mehrere Varianten.
